name: Red Mist
description:
● Gain exp and level up adding new cards to your deck. as you defeat monsters.
● Your health is equal to the number of cards in your deck. Every time you take 1 damage, the enemy takes 1 card. If your deck is exhausted, the game ends.
● Enemies come in rows of three carefully plan your attacks to line up enemies and knock them down. Otherwise you may be overwhelmed. You need to carefully determine the order of killing monsters, which will have an important impact on your later actions. A reasonable killing order will make your later battles more efficient with less effort, otherwise you may die suddenly.
● There are three types of cards in the game: attack and skill and curses being defensive is not an option against the the evils of the mist attack quickly and desperately to survive.
● At present, we have prepared three classes for you to experience. Each role has a different way of fighting, each requiring exploration and experience. to use effectively.
● More than 230 cards are available, with over 20 events. 12 bosses and 70 different kind of monsters.
● Of course, in addition to the normal game mode, we have also prepared a custom mode and daily challenge mode.
● What's new in the future? Coming soon!

Thank you for your attention and support!
